item.title: Bug In ChatGPT Is Stropping Chatbot From Saying 'David Mayer'
item.description: ChatGPT, the popular chatbot of Microsoft-backed artificial intelligence (AI) startup OpenAI, seems to be facing a bug, preventing it from producing any results related to the name "David Mayer".
